channel.title: photography on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in photography on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Canon Powershot S95
item.description: There’s something about photography that seems to attract programmers. So many of the really good programmers that I know are also into photography. I, on the other hand, am just happy if my latest photo of the kids doesn’t include massive red eye. I’m always happy when a shot looks nice, but I know I’m not interested enough to be an exceptional photographer. I’ve never wanted a fancy SLR camera because I know I’d leave it on the shelf collecting dust.
